import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Home, BookOpen, BarChart3, Search, Scan, Apple, ChefHat } from 'lucide-react'; import { recipes } from '../data/recipes'; const DashboardScreen = ({ userData, bmiData }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); const [scanInput, setScanInput] = useState(''); const [scannedIngredients, setScannedIngredients] = useState([]); const todayStats = { calories: 1450, target: 2200, protein: 65, carbs: 180, fat: 45, water: 6 }; const addIngredient = () => { if (scanInput.trim()) { setScannedIngredients([...scannedIngredients, scanInput.trim()]); setScanInput(''); } }; const HomeTab = () => (
